description:
Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers has represented injury victims in Newport News on the Virginia Peninsula for decades. We focus exclusively on personal injury law and wrongful death and have experience handling a variety of accident and injury claims. Our Newport News client meeting location is conveniently located on Warwick Blvd. near Huntington Park. We maintain a main office in Norfolk and six other client meeting locations in the Tidewater area.

Newport News is the third biggest city in Hampton Roads. We help many Newport News residents who are hurt in auto accidents, slip and fall accidents or industrial incidents. Newport News is a congested city that sees numerous wrecks on I-664, the Monitor-Merrimac-Memorial Bridge-Tunnel, the James River Bridge, Jefferson Avenue and I-64.

With more than 55 years of combined experience, our attorneys are highly capable legal professionals. Founders John Cooper and Jim Hurley have both been selected for inclusion in Virginia Super Lawyers - an honor reserved for 5 percent of practicing lawyers in the state. Partner Bill O'Mara and attorney John Baker have been selected to be a Rising Stars, an accolade reserved for under 2.5 percent of lawyers in the state.Additionally, John Cooper and Jim Hurley have been rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell's peer review system. Our legacy continues as we fight tirelessly to protect plaintiffs' rights in the Hampton Roads region. Among other personal injury claims, we deal with:

• Car and truck accidents
• Motorcycle accidents
• Slip and fall cases and other premises liability
• Brain and spinal injuries
• Railroad and railroad worker accidents
• Wrongful death
• Pedestrian accidents
• Cycling accidents
• Children's injuries

Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers has grown rapidly in recent years. The firm opened a new client meeting location in Newport News in 2018. Attorney Griffin O'Hanlon joined the firm in the fall of 2015, attorneys John Baker and Paige Thomas joined in 2018.

We are proud to say that Cooper Hurley Injury Lawyers is not a "factory firm." We will give you individual attention because we see our clients as family and that is the least you deserve. We have a proven record of successful verdicts and settlements, and will work tirelessly to get your life back on track after a serious injury or the loss of a loved one.

We meet with clients at our Newport News client meeting location by appointment only. If you are unable to arrange for transportation or are otherwise unable to make the commute to our offices, we can come to your home, hospital or wherever is most convenient. To schedule a free initial consultation at which to discuss your case, call 757-905-4240.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
